contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Software | name = Umbrello | logo=[[Image:umbrello-icon.svg|48px]]| screenshot = [[File:Umbrello KDE 4.1.png|250px]] | caption = Umbrello 1.5.3 with a sample diagram| developer = The Umbrello Team | latest_release_version = 2.5.1 | operating_system = [[Unix-like]] and [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]](experimental) | genre = [[UML tool]] | license = [[GNU General Public License|GPL]] | website = [http://uml.sourceforge.net/ uml.sourceforge.net/] | }} '''Umbrello UML Modeller''' is a [[free software]] [[Unified Modeling Language|UML]] diagram [[UML tool|tool]] available natively for [[Unix-like]] platforms, as well as [[Microsoft Windows]] (as part of KDE-Windows). It is part of the [[KDE Software Compilation 4|KDE SC 4]] but works well with other desktops and programming environments. Umbrello handles all the standard UML diagram types. It can [[UML software#Reverse engineering|reverse engineer]] code written in [[C++]], [[CORBA|IDL]], [[Pascal programming language|Pascal]]/[[Delphi programming language|Delphi]], [[Ada programming language|Ada]], [[Python (programming language)|Python]], and [[Java (programming language)|Java]], as well as import [[XML Metadata Interchange|XMI]] files generated by external tools from [[PHP]] ([http://tech.motion-twin.com/php_php2xmi.html]) or [[Perl]] code ([http://uml.sourceforge.net/developers/xmi_reverse.pl], [http://uml.sourceforge.net/developers/perl2xmi]) and export to various [[programming language]]s. Umbrello allows distribution of model contents by exporting to [[DocBook]] and [[XHTML]] formats. This aids in collaborative development efforts where team members may not have direct access to Umbrello, or in cases where model contents should be published on a web site. It is released along the [[kdesdk]] module of KDE. == Supported export programming languages == *[[ActionScript]] *[[Ada programming language|Ada]] *[[C Sharp (programming language)|C#]] *[[C++]] *[[D programming language|D]] *[[CORBA|IDL]] *[[Java (programming language)|Java]] *[[JavaScript]] *[[Pascal programming language|Pascal]] *[[Perl]] *[[PHP]] *[[Python (programming language)|Python]] *[[Ruby programming language|Ruby]] *[[SQL]] *[[Tcl]] *[[XML Schema (W3C)|XML Schema]] == See also == *[[List of UML tools]] == External links == *[http://uml.sourceforge.net/ Umbrello project homepage] {{KDE}} [[Category:KDE software]] [[Category:Free UML tools]] {{KDE-stub}} {{uml-stub}}
